analysis.key_quote: Potentially replacing these employees with every administration change will mean much of this experience is lost and will result in degraded service for all that use these agencies.
analysis.rationale: The comment expresses concern about the potential loss of experienced federal employees due to the proposed rule, indicating a belief that such changes would degrade service quality. This aligns with opposition to the rule, as it emphasizes the importance of institutional knowledge and continuity in government services.
